alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Luquillo; Rio Grande (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 05 at 10:21AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Canovanas, Ceiba, Fajardo, Luquillo and Rio Grande. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 921 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fajardo, Luquillo, Rio Grande, Canovanas, Loiza, Ceiba, Carolina, Hato Candal, Playa Fortuna, Ramos, La Dolores, Campo Rico, San Isidro, Aguas Claras, Luis M. Cintron, Santa Barbara, Roosevelt Roads, Palmer, Bartolo and Benitez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Luquillo; Rio Grande
